name: self-tuning
prompt: Daily self-tuning analysis. Use botcore CLI to: 1) `botcore get_tuning_dashboard` 2) `botcore get_parameter_bounds` 3) `botcore get_adjustment_history`. Based on data, apply max 2 GREEN adjustments if strongly supported. Present YELLOW suggestions for user confirmation. After analysis, send summary to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the report. Do NOT skip sending to Telegram.
